source:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_00<tab>The royal seneschal has reached a decision.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ベントブランチ牧場の執事王は、何かを決心したようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_01<tab>The royal seneschal appears to be Peatie's biggest fan, and he invites both her and Aldemund to Ul'dah, that the goobbue might be the star attraction of this year's Little Ladies' Day. Requesting your assistance in comforting Peatie as she becomes accustomed to the crowds, he departs to Ul'dah to make preparations for her grand debut. Aldemund and Peatie have business to attend to in Gridania before they follow, so the performer asks you to go ahead and await their arrival.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

執事王たちと話した。ピティーたちを迎える準備をするため、ウルダハへ向かい、ルビーロード国際市場で「執事王」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_02<tab>The royal seneschal informs you that the planning committee for Little Ladies' Day has agreed to welcome Peatie with open arms, and now he asks you to help do what you can to spread the same sentiment among the city's populace. He bids you travel to the Steps of Thal and drum up interest in the coming entertainment.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_02<tab>執事王と話した。ステージを盛り上げるため、ザル回廊にいるウルダハの住人たちに宣伝をしよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_03<tab>While not everyone you speak with is accepting of a goobbue in their city at first, you manage to convince several to attend the show, with some even expressing excitement at the prospect. Who knows how far their enthusiasm might spread? As the show draws near, all that remains is to visit the stage and report your success to the royal seneschal.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_03<tab>ウルダハの住人たち3人に宣伝をした。ウルダハのエメラルドアベニューのステージ付近にいる「執事王」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_04<tab>You arrive at the stage on Emerald Avenue to see a crowd much larger than the one in Gridania, all waiting in anticipation. It seems the presence of so many expectant guests has caused Peatie to freeze up, but Aldemund suggests that you /rally her spirits to shake her out of this fluster.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_04<tab>執事王に報告した。エメラルドアベニューのステージ付近にいる、緊張して怯えてしまったピティーに、エモート「励ます」をしよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_05<tab>Although Peatie is initially too frightened to respond to your encouragement, a few heartfelt words manage to break her loose from the clutches of fear and give her a newfound sense of determination. With the goobbue ready for her big show, you can now join the crowd and cheer for her success.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_05<tab>怯えるピティーを励ました。もうすぐピティーの出番になるので、ステージが見える、エメラルドアベニューの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB95C01 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_06<tab>Peatie takes the stage and dazzles all present with her performance, earning a hearty applause that makes her beam with pride. The royal seneschal appears eager to speak with you after this roaring success.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_06<tab>ピティーのステージを見守った。エメラルドアベニューのステージ付近にいる「執事王」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_07<tab>The show is the talk of Ul'dah, and Peatie basks in the people's adoration. Realizing that she is meant to keep on this road and that his best days as a performer are behind him, Aldemund asks that you take his companion along on your adventures. You accept the now-famous goobbue into your company without hesitation, and the royal seneschal and Jihli Aliapoh encourage you both to enjoy the remainder of the celebrations in Ul'dah and Gridania. With so much merrymaking across the realm, smiles will come easy for some time yet.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_07<tab>執事王と話した。ピティーのステージは大成功で、プリンセスデーも大いに盛り上がった。アルデムンドから託され、ピティーも旅に同行することになった。祝祭期間中は、グリダニアではエッグハント、ウルダハではプリンセスデーが引き続き開催されている。どちらの祝祭も盛り上がっているので、様子を見に行くのもいいかもしれない。

target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SEQ_08<tab>

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the royal seneschal in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_00<tab>ウルダハの執事王と話す

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ul'dahn citizens in the Steps of Thal.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_01<tab>ザル回廊にいるウルダハの住人に宣伝する

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the royal seneschal on Emerald Avenue.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_02<tab>エメラルドアベニューの執事王と話す

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_03<tab>/rally Peatie's spirits.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_03<tab>ピティーにエモート「励ます」をする

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_04<tab>Wait at the designated location.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB95C01 /var>で待機する

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the royal seneschal.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_TODO_05<tab>執事王と話す

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_001<tab>There's not a single egg left. Good work spreadin' the word, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_001<tab>おかげさまで、飾りたまご配りは大盛況じゃったわい。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_002<tab>Grrr!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_002<tab>グゥ～！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>I see you and Peatie are getting along like eggs and spriggans! I think you would agree that there could be no better an addition to the Little Ladies' Day festivities.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>グゥーブーちゃんに会えたのね！
今回の祝祭にぴったりの子だったでしょう？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_NONOTTA_000_004<tab>Did you see Peatie do her thing? 'Twas plain to me that she gave her all to getting every detail of the show just perfect. That's exactly the kind of enterprising spirit the realm's little ladies need!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_NONOTTA_000_004<tab>グゥーブーさんの芸、見ましたか？
がんばって練習してくれたみたいで、ノノッタうれしいのですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_010<tab>Although I've been but a bystander in affairs so far, what I've seen has been truly inspiring. Peatie is possessed not only of a kind heart, but the soul of an entertainer as well!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_010<tab>陰ながら宣伝活動を見ておりましたが、素晴らしかったですな！
懸念していた危険性もなく、ピティーさんは穏やかな淑女で、
プリンセスデーにもぴったりです！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_011<tab>I would have her be the main attraction of our stage in Ul'dah! On behalf of the Little Ladies' Day Planning Committee, I invite you to our city as honored guests!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_011<tab>ぜひその芸で、プリンセスデーのステージに、
花を添えていただきたい！
どうかウルダハにも来ていただけませんかな？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_012<tab>Well, I'm not one to decline such an eager invitation. Consider it accepted.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_012<tab>もちろん、誘ってもらえて光栄じゃわい。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_014<tab>But first, I'd best tell Miss Aliapoh that she'll be needin' more eggs. Go on to Ul'dah─we'll find our own way there before long.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_014<tab>では、私らはジリさんたちに、
たまごを配り終わったことを伝えてこようかのう。
あなたがたは、先にウルダハに向かっておくれ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_100_014<tab>Wonderful! Then I shall depart at once and make the stage ready for your arrival.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_100_014<tab>かたじけない！
そうと決まれば、早くウルダハに戻ってステージに備えねば……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_015<tab>Ahem. You've helped tremendously already, but there's no denying that Peatie has taken a shine to you. Might you watch over her in Ul'dah for a while─just until she becomes accustomed to the crowds?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_015<tab>ピティーさんもあなたがいた方が安心できるようですし、
ご足労をかけますが、ウルダハまで来ていただきたい！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_016<tab>Every stage is different, so it might take a while until Peatie finds her footin'. But her desire to see people smile can't be doubted. She'll shine brighter than all the jewels in any merchant's coffers.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_016<tab>ステージとなると、また緊張してしまうじゃろうか……
いや、人を喜ばせたい気持ちは確か。
きっと大丈夫じゃろうて。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_017<tab>Grrr! Hrrr!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_017<tab>ウゥゥー、グゥー♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_100_017<tab>Peatie appears excited for her next adventure: bringing joy to the hearts of the realm's little ladies.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_100_017<tab>ピティーは期待に満ちた目をしている。
プリンセスデーが楽しみなようだ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_018<tab>Our lovely Peatie is heading straight from her debut to the grand stage. I must leave at once to cheer her on!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_018<tab>グゥーブーちゃん、プリンセスデーにもお呼ばれしたのね！
よかったわ、出番には応援しに行かなくちゃ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_NONOTTA_000_019<tab>As expected, Lady Aliapoh's dream is coming to fruition. Give the warmest of regards to the royal seneschal for me!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_NONOTTA_000_019<tab>ジリちゃんの夢の再現ができそうで、よかったですぅ～。
ウルダハにいる執事王さんによろしくお願いします！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_020<tab>Ah, you are arrived! You'll be glad to know that I've managed to win over the planning committee with my story of Peatie's show. Ul'dah's gates will be cast wide for her arrival!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_020<tab>冒険者さん、お待ちしておりました。
反対していた者にも、この目で安全を確かめたと伝えたところ、
納得してもらえて、グゥーブーを招致できることになりました！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_021<tab>If she is amenable to the idea, I would have her be the star attraction on this year's stage.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_021<tab>ピティーさんには、ステージ後半の目玉企画として、
登場してもらいたいと思っています。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_022<tab>But the first order of the day is to spread the word! If we tell the citizens what we saw in Bentbranch Meadows, it is my hope that they will welcome Peatie with open arms.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_022<tab>まずは、グゥーブーによる芸の宣伝をいたしましょう。
ベントブランチ牧場での様子をしっかり伝えれば、
きっとウルダハでも受け入れてもらえるはずです！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_024<tab>And if her show is a success, then we will have managed a celebration which spans from Gridania to Ul'dah, painting smiles upon the faces of all the realm's little ladies and egg fanatics alike!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_024<tab>芸の披露が成功すれば、エッグハントとの合同企画として、
この上ない大成功を収められるに違いありません。
冒険者さん、ぜひご協力をお願いいたします！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_025<tab>I shall stay here and drum up what interest that I can. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pray head to the Steps of Thal and do the same. Meet me at the stage afterwards and together we can shower Peatie with applause.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_025<tab>私はこの付近で宣伝いたしますので、
冒険者さんは「ザル回廊」の市民たちにお声がけいただきたい。
終わりましたら、ステージまでお越しくだされ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_026<tab>Aldemund and Peatie will wait outside the city gates until the appointed time. Until then, it's up to us to spread the word and muster the largest crowd we can.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_026<tab>アルデムンドさんとピティーさんには、
出番になるまで外で待機してもらうつもりです。
ステージを盛り上げられるよう、宣伝の協力を頼みますぞ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_WOMAN04811_000_040<tab>A goobbue performer? Aren't they dangerous? I suppose a friend of mine <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> raving about the show she saw in Gridania...if it's the very same, I suppose it's worth a look!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_WOMAN04811_000_040<tab>へえ、グゥーブーが芸をね……
よく知らないけれど、グゥーブーって凶暴なのだと思っていたわ。
グリダニアで盛況だった芸なら、ぜひ見てみたいわね！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_041<tab>A goobbue, here in Ul'dah? <shudder> ...That dredges up terrible memories of the rampage I witnessed as a child...
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_041<tab>グゥーブー？
そんな……私が子供の頃に、
お祭りの途中で大暴れした魔物なのよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_042<tab>How do you know that won't happen again? Have you seen this goobbue with your own eyes?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_042<tab>それなのにまたウルダハへ呼ぶだなんて、
事故が起きたらどうするの……？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A1_000_001<tab>Yes, and she brought countless smiles to the people of Gridania.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A1_000_001<tab>黒衣森でも、市民に芸を披露したグゥーブーだ

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A1_000_002<tab>Yes, and she's as gentle as a tame chocobo.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A1_000_002<tab>穏やかな性格で、人に育てられたグゥーブーだ

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_043<tab>Is that so? Well, I see no reason why you would lie to me... Very well, I shall go. Perhaps in this way I can conquer my fears...
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_043<tab>そう……
大人しいグゥーブーだというなら行ってみようかしら。
素敵な思い出に上書きできるといいけど。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_MAN04811_000_044<tab>I didn't know goobbues were capable of anything more than mindless eating. Are you sure this “show” isn't just watching a beast chomping on hay?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_MAN04811_000_044<tab>芸をするグゥーブー？
グゥーブーって、あの魔物のグゥーブーか！？
またまた、冒険者さんったらご冗談を……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A2_000_001<tab>The crowds of Gridania gave her a standing ovation.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A2_000_001<tab>グリダニアで大好評だった

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A2_000_002<tab>So what if it is? You'll still have a chance to see a goobbue up close.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A2_000_002<tab>冗談かどうか、その目で確かめてみればいい

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_MAN04811_000_045<tab>Well, when you put it that way... Besides, it's not as if I have aught else to do. All right, look for me among the crowd!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_MAN04811_000_045<tab>え、冗談じゃなくて本当なのか？
だとしたら、滅多に見られるものじゃないぞ……
これは見逃してなるものか、行くっきゃないぜ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>The time of Peatie's performance draws near. Speak with the royal seneschal before she takes the stage.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>ザル回廊の住人たちに宣伝した。
そろそろ「執事王」のところに戻ろう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_047<tab>Grrr...
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_047<tab>グゥゥゥ……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_048<tab>This crowd's got even <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> knees shakin'... I can't imagine what Peatie must be feelin'.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_048<tab>ううむ、やはり緊張してしもうたか……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_050<tab>My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It seems word has spread even further than I had hoped.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_050<tab>冒険者さん、宣伝ありがとうございました！
おかげさまで、多くの人がこちらに向かってきてくれています！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_051<tab>And while this is cause for celebration, Peatie appears to be intimidated by their expectant gazes.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_051<tab>しかし、集まってきた人を見たピティーさんが、
どうやら、ふたたび緊張してしまったようなのです。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_052<tab>Grrr...
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_052<tab>グゥゥゥ……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_053<tab>'Course, you could just hop up on her head and she'd calm down just like that. But we can't lean on you forever.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_053<tab>先ほどのように、頭に乗ってもらえれば落ち着くかもしれんが、
いつまでもそれでは、ピティーも成長できん。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_054<tab>Why don't you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> her spirits with some encouragin' words, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Seems she's warmed to you, and I reckon she'd appreciate whatever you have to say.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_054<tab>すまんが、冒険者殿が「励まして」やってくれんじゃろうか。
この子は、あなたに懐いているようじゃからな。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_055<tab>Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> her spirits like you would your allies before a death-defyin' battle.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_055<tab>すまんが、冒険者殿が「励まして」やってくれんか。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_056<tab>She can dazzle them, she just needs to believe...
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_056<tab>ぜひ彼女にステージを盛り上げてほしいのですが……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_060<tab>Truth be told, this is her first time performin' alone in front of so many people. I can see why her legs won't listen to her heart.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_060<tab>うーむ、ひとりでステージに立つのも初めてじゃから、
自信がないのかもしれんのう……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A3_000_001<tab>Remember how happy you made everyone in Gridania!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A3_000_001<tab>グリダニアで人を笑顔にしたことを思い出せ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A3_000_002<tab>Don't worry, Peatie, I'm right here.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A3_000_002<tab>大丈夫、ちゃんと見守ってる

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A3_000_003<tab>Little Ladies' Day needs its princess!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A3_000_003<tab>君もプリンセスデーで輝く姫だろう？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_061<tab>Grrr!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_061<tab>…………！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_062<tab>That did the trick! You've really got a talent for liftin' the spirits of the downtrodden, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_062<tab>おお、やる気になってくれたようじゃ！
冒険者殿、心強いお言葉感謝する。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_063<tab>We are in your debt, truly!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_063<tab>ありがとうございます、冒険者さん！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_064<tab>It's almost time. Lady Aliapoh should have arrived by now─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pray join the bystanders and give Peatie your heartiest cheer!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_064<tab>まもなくピティーさんの出番ですな……
ステージを見届けるため、ジリさんもこちらに向かっているはず。
あなたも、ぜひ見ていてあげてくだされ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_065<tab>Grrr...
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_065<tab>グゥゥゥ……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_000_066<tab>Peatie is frozen with fright, but she may come to if you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> her spirits.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_000_066<tab>すっかり怯えてしまっているようだ……
ピティーにエモート「励ます」をしよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_067<tab>The show shall start anon. Go on, join the crowd and lend your voice to the cheers!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_067<tab>まもなく、ピティーさんの出番です！
あなたもぜひ、彼女の晴れ舞台を見てあげてくだされ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_068<tab>Your words were like a drop of water on a hot day. I reckon Peatie might even like you more than me!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_068<tab>あなたの励ましで、自信を取り戻したようじゃな。
どうやら、すっかり冒険者殿に懐いているようじゃわい。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_069<tab>Grrr!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_069<tab>グゥー！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_100_069<tab>Peatie is ready to take the stage. Join the other bystanders to see what she has in store for Ul'dah's little ladies.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_100_069<tab>ピティーから、やる気が伝わってくる……！
ステージに立つピティーを見守るため、
「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB95C01 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_070<tab>And now for the final act! Bedecked in blooming flowers, this goobbue princess has prepared something unforgettable for all the little ladies out there!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_070<tab>次は今回の目玉企画！
桃の花に彩られたグゥーブーの姫に、
プリンセスデーへ新たな彩りを添えていただきましょう！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_071<tab>This is just how I envisioned it in my dream!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_071<tab>すごい！
夢で見た景色と同じだわ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_072<tab>(-Elegant Citizen-)And to think I ever believed goobbues were naught but wild beasts! Oh, I simply adore her!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_LADY04811_000_072<tab>(-おしとやかなウルダハ市民-)グゥーブーといえば、怖いものだと思っていたけれど、
こんな可愛らしい子もいるのね……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_GUY04811_000_073<tab>(-Animated Citizen-)If Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is even half as thrilling as this show, I'd best catch the next airship to Gridania!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_GUY04811_000_073<tab>(-盛り上がっているウルダハ市民-)エッグハントか……すげえ、楽しそうな祝祭だな……
どんな感じなのか興味湧いてきたし、
祝祭がやっている間に、グリダニアにも行ってみようぜ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_074<tab>Heh, all's well that ends well. The little ladies get a great show, and Hatching<var 1F /var>tide gets more egg seekers.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_074<tab>はっはっは、文化交流としても大成功じゃな。
エッグハントも、ますます盛り上がるじゃろうて。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_075<tab>Their smiles are like so many flowers in full bloom! Peatie will be the talk of Ul'dah for moons to come.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_075<tab>笑顔の花もいっぱい咲いたわ！
グゥーブーちゃんが、受け入れてもらえてよかった！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_076<tab>That she will, that she will. I have to thank you, Miss Aliapoh, for givin' us both the chance to bring a little brightness to so many lives.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_076<tab>そうじゃな……ジリさんもあの子も、いい笑顔じゃ。
「姫」たちを笑顔にできたのだから、
プリンセスデーも大成功じゃのう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_077<tab>I've left Nonotta in charge of goings-on in Gridania. Oh, would that she could see my dream come alive!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_077<tab>ステージを見るため、向こうはノノッタちゃんに任せてきたけど、
夢のとおりになって、よかったわ！
グゥーブーちゃんの芸で、みんなが笑顔になったもの！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_100_077<tab>I reckon Peatie had the most fun out of everyone here.
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_100_077<tab>この子も楽しめたようで、なによりじゃ……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_078<tab>Grrr! Graaarrr!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_PDYGOOBBUE04811_000_078<tab>グゥ、グゥゥ～！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_100_078<tab>Peatie appears elated by the crowd's reaction, and gazes at the stage longingly.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_100_078<tab>ピティーは満足そうにしている。
ステージは、すごく楽しかったようだ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_080<tab>Thank you, Peatie, for bringing joy to the citizens of Ul'dah─especially its little ladies!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_080<tab>ピティーさん、改めてステージを盛り上げてくださって、
ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_081<tab>That was better than I could have imagined. Hatching<var 1F /var>tide and Little Ladies' Day both will be remembered as the highlights of the year!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_081<tab>すっごく盛り上がったね！
今回のエッグハントもプリンセスデーも大成功よ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_082<tab>Couldn't have done it without your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We'll both be lookin' back on this experience with fondness for the rest of our lives.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_082<tab>冒険者殿、ピティーを励ましてくれたこと、感謝するぞ。
この子もすっかりあなたに懐いておるわい。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_083<tab>Speakin' of which...I've got to thinkin' maybe it's time I leave this performance business behind me, and let Peatie spread her wings. I think she'd be more than happy by your side, if you'll have her.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_083<tab>そこで相談なんじゃが……
どうか、これからの旅に、ピティーを連れていってくれんか。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_084<tab>As for me, I have it in mind to find a place to settle down and rest these old bones.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_084<tab>私ももう、この歳じゃからのう。
そろそろ引退を考えておったんじゃ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_085<tab>I'd hate to tie Peatie down just when she's found her passion. If you bring her along on your adventures, she'll be able to deliver smiles to corners of the world I've only heard tales of.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_085<tab>引退すれば、ひとつの場所に留まることになるじゃろう。
そんな私に寄り添うより、旅する冒険者殿とともに行って、
たくさんの人に笑顔を届けてほしいんじゃ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_Q4_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A4_000_001<tab>How could I say no?
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A4_000_001<tab>お安い御用だ

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A4_000_002<tab>Are you sure you can manage without her?
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_A4_000_002<tab>連れていっちゃっていいの？

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_086<tab>Truth be told, I only asked you as a formality, hah. I know I've placed her in good hands, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_086<tab>頼もしいわい。
これで、安心して引退できるというものじゃ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_087<tab>Can't deny I already feel the tendrils of loneliness tuggin' at my heart, but they'll lose their grip so long as I know Peatie's with you.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_087<tab>寂しくないと言ったら嘘になるわい。
じゃが、この子にとっても旅を続けるほうがよかろうて。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_088<tab>I look forward to hearin' of her exploits as I while the days away.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_088<tab>ピティーが披露する芸の噂が、
私の耳に届く日を、楽しみにしておるよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_089<tab>I don't mean to be rude, but I am required in Gridania. Nonotta must know just how perfectly my dream manifested!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_089<tab>それじゃあ、私はグリダニアに戻るね。
ノノッタちゃんにも、
夢のとおりになったって教えてあげなきゃ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_090<tab>Heh, give the lass our regards, eh? I'll stay here in Ul'dah until the festivities end─and who knows, maybe longer.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_ALDEMUND_000_090<tab>はっはっは、いい報告をしてあげておくれ。
私は、プリンセスデーが終わるまでは、
ウルダハに滞在させてもらうとするかのう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_091<tab>And with that, allow me to thank you personally, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. No princess in all the realm could have asked for a more devoted seneschal.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_091<tab>改めて冒険者さん、ご協力ありがとうございました。
おかげさまで、とても素敵なプリンセスデーになりましたぞ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_092<tab>And that includes Peatie. Seeing you dote upon her so dutifully reminded me why I volunteered for this position in the first place.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_092<tab>此度の冒険者さんは、
まるでピティーさんという「姫」に仕える「執事」のようで、
おふたりが心を通わせていく様に、私の胸も温かくなりました。

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_093<tab>Although Peatie's show has concluded, Little Ladies' Day has not! Pray enjoy all that we have prepared.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_093<tab>これからも、プリンセスデーの祝祭は続きます。
残りの祝祭期間も楽しんでいってください！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_093<tab>And don't be a stranger in Gridania, either!
target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_093<tab>グリダニアのエッグハントもよろしくね！

source: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have unlocked the Egg Hunter Riggy mini-game. To play mini-games, open the toy chest found in any inn room.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>各国の宿屋の客室にある「トイボックス」から、
ミニゲームを遊ぶことができます。

target: TEXT_FESPDY902_04811_BUTLER_000_013<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
